title: Cant launch league
body: I press the play button and nothing happens, it doesnt bring up the login screen or anything. So I used the hextech repair tool to uninstall and reinstall the game, forced a repatch, and it still wouldnt work. I cant even run the repair option in the launcher, as clicking on it doesnt do anything either. Help rito all i want to do is play

replies.body: You might have a security setting that's preventing the patcher from launching.  Before trying a reinstall, your best bet would be to first go over each step of the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide.  This will help make sure your patcher and game have access to launch and function properly.  Hopefully that will get thing squared away!
I did most of the things on the list you so kindly liked and I am able to play again, tvm <3
